Title: Study Center
descripation: Some quick example text to build on the card title and make up the bulk of the card
detail: With the purpose of sharing smiles, team Needs made another happy visit to Gandhi Ashram last Sunday.The presence of our team overwhelmed the little girls as we stepped into the girl's ashram at the root. After distribution of sweets and clothes, we could manage to bring smiles in those young faces.Our clock with the physically and mentally disabled friends rejoiced them. Ultimately, we headed towards the boy's ashram to witness their skills. A friendly match of football was played in which the little boys outperformed our team. Handing out the tokens of happiness, our visit came to a halt. We intend to spread a more number of smiles in the days to come. Keep supporting us! Team Needs.
